404.title: 404 Page Not Found
404.text: The page you requested does not exist.

home.scrollAnimationFirstLine: The best time to be alive is now.
home.scrollAnimationSecondLine: However you look at human development, things are better now than they used to be.
home.collection: We are looking at things over the long run
home.beautifulNumbersText: If you observe any human development over the long term - say from a perspective of 200 years - things have gotten much, much better.
home.aboutUsText: Our garments can serve as a reminder that the latest Tweets and cable news don’t mean we’re standing at the edge of doom. We are creating long term graphics on garments that should last a long term. We don’t follow seasons. Our clothes are carefully made in New York City.

product.deliveryInformationLowerOne: Free US delivery. For more information and international rates vist
product.sizeFitLowerOneFrench: French seamed, double reinforced buttons, womens shirt has XXXXX. Please see our
product.sizeFitLowerOneSlim: Slim fit, light and incredibly soft sweater. Please see our
product.sizeFitLowerOneLoose: Loose fit, double stitched with zipped pockets, flat front waist with elastic back and a drawstring. Please see our
product.sizeFitLowerOneComfortable: Comfortable fit with two zipped front pockets and a doubled hood. Please see our
product.sizeFitLowerOneBomber: Loose fit bomber with two inside and two outside pockets. Please see our
product.sizeFitLowerOne: Tailored fit with two outside and zipped inside pockets. Womens coat has xxx. Please see our
product.fabricCareLowerFrench: 100% cotton, wrinkle-free. Hand or machine wash in cold water, then drip dry or tumble dry low heat, iron low heat. Or simply dry clean.
product.fabricCareLowerJapan: 100% cotton shirting from Japan. Hand or machine wash in cold water, then drip dry or tumble dry low heat, iron low heat. Or simply dry clean.
product.fabricCareLowerJapanTwo: Our 100% cotton twill from Japan. Hand or machine wash in cold water, then drip dry or tumble dry low heat, iron low heat, or simply dry clean.
product.fabricCareLowerItalian: Italian Merino wool and egyptian cotton. Hand or machine wash in cold water, then drip dry or tumble dry low heat.
product.fabricCareLowerUsa: 60% rayon 33% nylon 7% lycra ponte fabric from USA. Hand or machine wash in cold water, then drip dry or tumble dry low heat.
product.fabricCareLowerWater: Water repellent 50% cotton 50% nylon twill from Japan, Hand or machine wash in cold water and drip dry or dry clean.
product.lightningJacketProcess: The colorful lightining design is printed in a small Industry City studio in New York City. Unzip it, and inside you will find a soft lining featuring our koala printed for us in Italy.
product.lightningJacketFirstSlideText: 50 people died struck by lightening (per 1 million people).
product.lightningJacketSecondSlideText: this number was halved, 25 people died struck by lightening.
product.lightningJacketThirdSlideText: Only 6 died.  Our progress predicting the weather and our safety equipment have vastly improved.
product.lightningJacketFourthSlideTextSecond: We tend to look at accidents as things that just happen. But preventing them is a moral triumph.
product.lifeShirtProcess: This shirt is not printed, but instead has cut out features made from Japanese manufactured cotton. It is meticulously assembled for us in New York City. It’s wrinkle free, so you don’t have to worry about it always staying in great shape.
product.lifeShirtFirstSlideText: the average life expectancy around the world was just 28 years.
product.lifeShirtSecondSlideText: we can expect to live 71 years, over two and a half times as long. Most of us are rather alive than dead: This is progress.
product.marathonHoodieProcessOne: Hoodie for all four seasons, whether you’re running marathons or staying lazy. It features two invisible zipper pockets to make sure nothing falls out.
product.marathonHoodieProcessTwo: Make it a set - get our Marathon Pants for the complete look.
product.marathonPantsProcessOne: The perfect weight for all four seasons, whether you’re running marathons or slouching on the couch. Made with durable American ponte fabric, featuring two invisible zippers for the front and an extra back pocket, keeping things from falling out while jogging.
product.marathonPantsProcessTwo: Go all in! See our Marathon Hoodie for the complete look.
product.marathonHoodieFirstSlideText: in NYC took place in 1970. Of the 127 people who ran, 55 finished.
product.marathonHoodieSecondSlideText: estimates there were only 200 people in the entire country in good enough shape to finish a marathon.
product.opinionCoatProcess: The graphics are printed using a 9 color silk-screen process in a small studio in Brooklyn. To make life a little more colorful, inside of this coat you will find a lazy koala.
product.opinionCoatFirstSlideText: almost half of all Americans believed women should return to their traditional roles in society.
product.opinionCoatSecondSlideText: only a third of Americans shared that opinion.
product.opinionCoatThirdSlideText: only a quarter of americans believed women should return to the kitchen.
product.pedestrianSweaterProgress: Pedestrian, yet luxurious. The sweater has been knitted and assembled for us by a small family business in Brooklyn. For the egg shape we use Egyptian cotton harvested by hand in five stages, avoiding defoliants and other chemicals used in mechanical harvesting.
product.pedestrianSweaterFirstSlideText: 11 American pedestrians died in traffic - per 100,000 people.
product.pedestrianSweaterSecondSlideText: only 2 American pedestrians died in traffic (per 100,000). Walking in our cities has become six times safer.
product.progressShirtProgress: Our Progress shirt has been embroidered by a mother and son business in NYC. It’s very unique design will remind you of how much great progress we made in the last century.
product.progressShirtFirstSlideText: 1 out of 100 women died while bearing a child.
product.progressShirtSecondSlideText: Only 1 out of 100 breast cancer patients succumbs to the disease. Having a child used to be as dangerous as having breast cancer.

shoppingBag.delivery: Free Delivery in USA, flat fee of $20 for rest of the world. Easy returns on all orders. Need help? email us at: XXXX@sagmeister123.com

shoppingBagMini.emptyShoppingBag: There’s nothing in your shopping bag.

beautifulNumbers.title: Beautiful Numbers
beautifulNumbers.infoBeautifulNumbers: Short-term media like Twitter and hourly news create an impression of a world out of control, with democracy in peril, ubiquitous conflicts, and an overall outlook of doom. But if we look at developments concerning the world from a long-term perspective - the only sense-making way - almost any aspect concerning humanity seems to get better.
beautifulNumbers.infoGallery: The goal behind these visualizations is that viewers might want to place them into their living rooms or wear them, as reminders that the latest tweets are just tiny blips in an overall rather healthy environment.

termsConditions.title: Terms & Conditions

Sagmeister 123 offers this website, including all information, tools and services available from this site to you, the user, conditioned upon your acceptance of all terms, conditions, policies and notices stated here.

These Terms of Service apply  to all users of the site, including without limitation users who are browsers, vendors, customers, merchants, and/ or contributors of content.
termsConditions.introThirdParagraph: Please read these Terms of Service carefully before accessing or using our website. By accessing or using any part of the site, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to all the terms and conditions of this agreement, then you may not access the website or use any services. If these Terms of Service are considered an offer, acceptance is expressly limited to these Terms of Service.
termsConditions.introFourthParagraph: Any new features or tools which are added to the current store shall also be subject to the Terms of Service. You can review the most current version of the Terms of Service at any time on this page. We reserve the right to update, change or replace any part of these Terms of Service by posting updates and/or changes to our website. It is your responsibility to check this page periodically for changes. Your continued use of or access to the website following the posting of any changes constitutes acceptance of those changes.
termsConditions.introFifthParagraph: Our store is hosted on Shopify Inc. They provide us with the online e-commerce platform that allows us to sell our products and services to you.
termsConditions.sectionOneFirstParagraph: By agreeing to these Terms of Service, you represent that you are at least the age of majority in your state or province of residence, or that you are the age of majority in your state or province of residence and you have given us your consent to allow any of your minor dependents to use this site.
termsConditions.sectionOneSecondParagraph: You may not use our products for any illegal or unauthorized purpose nor may you, in the use of the Service, violate any laws in your jurisdiction (including but not limited to copyright laws).
termsConditions.sectionOneThirdParagraph: You must not transmit any worms or viruses or any code of a destructive nature.
termsConditions.sectionOneFourthParagraph: A breach or violation of any of the Terms will result in an immediate termination of your Services.
termsConditions.sectionTwoFirstParagraph: We reserve the right to refuse service to anyone for any reason at any time.
termsConditions.sectionTwoSecondParagraph: You understand that your content (not including credit card information), may be transferred unencrypted and involve (a) transmissions over various networks; and (b) changes to conform and adapt to technical requirements of connecting networks or devices. Credit card information is always encrypted during transfer over networks.
termsConditions.sectionTwoThirdParagraph: You agree not to reproduce, duplicate, copy, sell, resell or exploit any portion of the Service, use of the Service, or access to the Service or any contact on the website through which the service is provided, without express written permission by us.

These restrictions may include orders placed by or under the same customer account, the same credit card, and/or orders that use the same billing and/or shipping address. delivery.title: Delivery and Returns
delivery.deliverySectionFirstParagraph: All orders are processed within 1 to 2 business days (excluding weekends, holidays) after receiving your order confirmation email. You will receive another notification when your order has shipped.
delivery.deliverySectionSecondParagraph: When your order has shipped, you will receive an email notification from us which will include a tracking number you can use to check its status. Please allow 48 hours for the tracking information to become available.
delivery.deliverySectionThirdParagraph: If you haven’t received your order within 7-10 days of receiving your shipping confirmation email, please contact us at XXX@sagmeister123.com with your name and order number, and we will look into it for you.
delivery.deliveryUsSectionFirstParagraph: US shipping is free. All orders are shipped via USPS and include a tracking as well as insurance. This information will be emailed to you upon shipping. Please allow 3-6 business days for your parcel to arrive.
delivery.deliveryUsSectionSecondParagraph: Unfortunately we cannot ship to Post Office Boxes and US territories including American Samoa, Baker Island, Federated States of Micronesia, Guam, Howland Island, Jarvis Island, Johnston Atoll, Kingman Reef, Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands, Midway Islands, Navassa Island, Palmyra Atoll, and Wake Island.
delivery.deliveryUsSectionThirdParagraph: If the recipient refuses delivery, all charges related to the return will be the responsibility of the purchaser and will be deducted from the purchaser’s refund.
delivery.internationalDeliverySectionFirstParagra: International parcels are shipped via DHL Express and include a tracking as well as insurance. All orders are a flat fee of $30. This information will be emailed to you upon shipping. Please allow 2-5 business days for your parcel to arrive depending on custom’s clearing. International orders may be subject to additional taxes and duties that are the sole responsibility of the purchaser.
delivery.returnsSectionFirstParagraphPartOne: We can refund or exchange any Sagmeister 123 product in new, unworn condition with its original tags and packaging, as long as we are notified within 14 days of delivery. We will refund your method of payment for the purchase price, less shipping, once we receive your return package within 14 working days. We will only refund postage costs to return an item where the return is required due to our error i.e. we sent you the wrong item.
delivery.returnsSectionFirstParagraphPartTwo: We will not refund postage costs to return items which are unwanted or no longer required. These costs will need to be covered by you. We cannot accept responsibility for parcels lost in transit and you are advised to obtain proof of postage and send via a tracked method. Returns and exchanges can take up to 3 - 5 working days to be processed once received. We kindly ask you to email us at XXXX@sagmeister123.com for authorisation before returning or exchanging items. We cannot issue refunds or exchanges for items returned without authorisation from Sagmeister 123 customer care. In your email, please specify your order number and reason for return or exchange. This does not affect your statutory rights.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.customerServiceLower: We always love to hear from you. Really! If it’s bad, tell us. If it’s good, tell others. And us too. contact@sagmeister123.com
contact.sellingProductsLower: If you run or know of a store and would like to sell our wares, please do contact us at:
contact.PressPrLower: We have lots of great pictures to share

about.title: About
about.firstSectionFirstText: Every button we attach is doubly sewn, every zipper we use is of the highest quality.
about.firstSectionSecondText: We are using only the very best fabrics, many woven in Italy and Japan.
about.firstSectionThirdText: We want our garments to last for years and years.
about.firstSectionFourthText: They are about long term thinking. They are also about long term lasting.
about.secondSectionFirstText: We produce everything we can in New York City. This allows us to actually meet up with the pattern makers, seamstresses and finishers. They pay higher rents for their apartments than people who work in sweatshops in far away places.
about.secondSectionSecondText: So the price of the garments is not low.
about.secondSectionThirdText: Everything we produce is hand signed by Stefan Sagmeister. We don’t think of these pieces as artworks - they are not. Compared to cutting and sowing them all by hand, signing is easy.
about.secondSectionFifthText: Unless you are the kind of person who owns a ‘Namaste in bed’ pillow.
about.thirdSectionFirstText: The Koala is the laziest animal in the forest. It eats eucalyptus all day and is constantly stoned. It’s lazier than the sloth, even.
about.thirdSectionSecondText: We created only 7 pieces, two shirts, a pair of trousers, a sweater, a jacket and a coat. If a piece sells well, we might produce it again, maybe in a different color. We don’t do seasons. We might be the laziest fashion company on the planet.
about.thirdSectionThirdText: The Koala is our patron saint.
about.thirdSectionFourthText: This one was animated by our friend Santiago Carasquilla, who actually is not lazy (but possibly stoned).
about.fourthSectionFirstText: Sagmeister123 consists of three people: Stefan Sagmeister designs, Anni Kuan produces and Karolina Ciecholewska creates the website and runs social media. If there is a profit, we split it between the three of us.
about.fourthSectionSecondText: Many more people were involved in making it happen, among them programmer Jakub Nowakowski, photographer Henry Hargreaves, stylist XXXXX, video color grader Josh Burgess.

retailers.title: Retailers
retailers.firstSectionFirstText: There is Stefan’s nephew’s store, who took over Stefan’s brothers store - which was Stefan’s parents store in Stefan’s hometown in Austria, Bregenz.
retailers.secondSectionFirstText: There is Stefan’s sister-in-law’s store, which is located right next to Stefan’s nephew’s store, but only sells clothes for women.
retailers.thirdSectionFirstText: There is the store in the museum which carried many of Stefan’s exhibits in Vienna:
retailers.fourthSectionFirstText: There is Stefan’s friend’s Reini store in Vienna:
retailers.goodNewsText: ... or buy from where you are

cookies.text: This website uses cookies. By continuing to browse the site you are agreeing to the use of cookies. Read more here.
